column5: Tucked away on the grounds of The Country Abbey Weddings and Events Venue, this delightful bungalow is designed with your comfort and privacy in mind. It has amenities you want in a Bed and Breakfast, but is uncluttered and tranquil in every way. If you're traveling solo or bringing friends, the house is yours exclusively. Come and be refreshed in mind, body and spirit. 115 N. Snyder, Justin, TX. Pets are not allowed.
